geography: The forbidden sacred ground of Skypiea, containing solid earth (vearth) unlike other cloud-based sky islands. Former part of Jaya before being launched into the sky by the Knock Up Stream.

keyEvents.title: Upper Yard Revealed as Forbidden Zone
keyEvents.description: Pagaya and Conis explain that Upper Yard is a forbidden sacred ground where God Enel resides, and anyone who enters never returns alive.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Upper Yard as the primary location for the arc's conflicts and the most dangerous area in Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: Four Priests Chase Treasure Hunter
keyEvents.description: The four priests are shown chasing an illegal treasure hunter through Upper Yard's forest.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates that Upper Yard is patrolled by Enel's most powerful enforcers.

keyEvents.title: Enel's Lightning Strikes Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: Enel demonstrates his power by firing a massive lightning beam that obliterates a treasure hunter in Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that Enel can strike anywhere in Upper Yard, making it an inescapable death trap.

keyEvents.title: Shandia Warrior Appears in Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: A masked Shandia warrior (Wyper) attacks the priests near Upper Yard with a bazooka.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals that the Shandia are actively fighting to reclaim Upper Yard from Enel.

culturalSignificance: Upper Yard is the most valuable territory in Skypiea due to its vearth (solid earth), which is extremely rare in the sky. It is the cause of a 400-year war between the Skypieans and Shandia.

reveals.information: Forbidden sacred ground where God Enel resides
Anyone who enters Upper Yard never returns alive
Contains precious vearth (solid earth) that is fought over

geography: A beach area in Skypiea where the Straw Hats' ship, the Going Merry, is docked. Part of Angel Island.

keyEvents.title: Conis Explains Enel's Rule
keyEvents.description: At Angel Beach, Conis explains to the Straw Hats about God Enel's omnipresent surveillance and control over Skypiea.
keyEvents.significance: The crew learns about the theocratic system that governs Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: White Berets Arrive at Angel Beach
keyEvents.description: Captain McKinley and the White Berets arrive at Angel Beach to arrest the Straw Hats for illegal entry.
keyEvents.significance: Angel Beach becomes a battleground between the Straw Hats and Skypiea's law enforcement.

keyEvents.title: Battle at Angel Beach
keyEvents.description: The White Berets attack the Straw Hats at Angel Beach using Dial weapons and cloud arrows.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Skypiean combat technology against the crew.

culturalSignificance: Angel Beach serves as a neutral ground and docking area for visitors to Skypiea, though it's monitored by authorities.
